a:s.a:s: /* * Library: IMMZD2DTMeaslesOngoingTransmissionLogic (IMMZ.D2.DT.Measles.Ongoing transmission) * Rule: Determine if the client is due for a measles vaccination according to the national immunization schedule * Decision Table: Countries with ongoing transmission in which the risk of measles mortality remains high (countries that provide first dose of measles-containing vaccine (MCV) at 9 months and second dose of MCV at 15 months) * Trigger: IMMZ.D2 Determine required vaccination(s) if any */ library IMMZD2DTMeaslesOngoingTransmissionLogic

def.name: Today
Patient
Patient
Client is not due for first dose of measles-containing vaccine (MCV1)

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for first dose of measles-containing vaccine (MCV1)

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

expression.name: Client's age is less than 9 months

def.name: Client is not due for first dose of measles-containing vaccine (MCV1) Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for first dose of measles-containing vaccine (MCV1) Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client as client's age is less than 9 months. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for MCV1.

a:s.a:s: 'Should not vaccinate client as client\'s age is less than 9 months. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for MCV1.'

expression.value: Should not vaccinate client as client's age is less than 9 months. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for MCV1.

def.name: Client is due for MCV1

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for MCV1

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Due"

a:s.a:s: "No measles primary series doses were administered"
"Client's age is more than or equal to 9 months"
"No live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks"

operand.name: No measles primary series doses were administered
Client's age is more than or equal to 9 months
No live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks

def.name: Client is due for MCV1 Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is due for MCV1 Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should vaccinate client with MCV1 as no measles doses were administered, client is within appropriate age range and no live vaccine administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.

a:s.a:s: 'Should vaccinate client with MCV1 as no measles doses were administered, client is within appropriate age range and no live vaccine administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.'

expression.value: Should vaccinate client with MCV1 as no measles doses were administered, client is within appropriate age range and no live vaccine administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.

a:t.value: "Immunization recommendation status" = "Not due"

a:s.a:s: "No measles primary series doses were administered"
"Client's age is more than or equal to 9 months"
"Live vaccine was administered in the last 4 weeks"

def.name: Client is not due for MCV1 Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Client is not due for MCV1 Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Should not vaccinate client with MCV1 as live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for MCV1.

a:s.a:s: 'Should not vaccinate client with MCV1 as live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for MCV1.'

expression.value: Should not vaccinate client with MCV1 as live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for MCV1.

def.name: Measles primary series is complete

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Measles primary series is complete

a:t.name: pseudocode
a:t.value: "Completed the primary vaccination series" = TRUE (where "Vaccine type" = "Measles-containing vaccines")

def.name: Measles primary series is complete Guidance

a:t.name: output
a:t.value: Measles primary series is complete Guidance

a:t.name: guidance
a:t.value: Measles primary series is complete. Two measles primary series doses were administered. Check if a measles supplementary dose is appropriate for the client.

a:s.a:s: 'Measles primary series is complete. Two measles primary series doses were administered. Check if a measles supplementary dose is appropriate for the client.'

expression.value: Measles primary series is complete. Two measles primary series doses were administered. Check if a measles supplementary dose is appropriate for the client.

def.name: Has Guidance
Test Validation

a:t.name: test
a:t.value: Test expected results based on example patients

a:s.a:s: "Client is not due for first dose of measles-containing vaccine (MCV1)"
'Should not vaccinate client as client\'s age is less than 9 months. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for MCV1.'
'Should vaccinate client with MCV1 as no measles doses were administered, client is within appropriate age range and no live vaccine administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.'
'Should not vaccinate client with MCV1 as live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for MCV1.'
"Client is not due for second dose of measles-containing vaccine (MCV2)"
'Should not vaccinate client with MCV2 as client\'s age is less than 15 months. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for MCV2.'
'Should vaccinate client with MCV2 as client is within appropriate age range and no live vaccine administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for contraindications.'
'Should not vaccinate client with MCV2 as live vaccine was administered in the past 4 weeks. Check for any vaccines due and inform the caregiver of when to come back for MCV2.'
'Measles primary series is complete. Two measles primary series doses were administered. Check if a measles supplementary dose is appropriate for the client.'
